Greetings

I must say...
I am not against people talking about 11 September, Islam atrocities, etc
But it MUST have something to do with the topic.

In this diggest, I saw people advocating kristendoom, saying things pro and
against it, or islam, or etc etc etc and all things related with the middle
eastern world. However I ask as well...

Whaddya HEL *giggles* it have to do with Samurai History?!?!?!?
